QuestData.Title: Fruit of the Doom
QuestData.Description: Now is the time to strike.$b$bShadowbloom has... potent digestive qualities. Go sprinkle some on Daglir's fruit bowls and watch the show.$b$bMeanwhile, I will use the manatrout liquor to cement my position as the premier fruit vendor in the city.
QuestData.CompletionText: Daglir will be ruined after this.
QuestData.RewardText: Victory tastes sweeter than any dish, even one of mine.
